summary: Test suite for the JoinMarket wallet RPC interface and associated websocket notifications, setting up a wallet daemon, issuing RPC commands to exercise wallet creation, address generation, transaction sending, coinjoin mixing, UTXO handling, lock/unlock, and session management, and asserting that the expected responses and websocket events are produced.
business_intent: Ensure the JoinMarket wallet RPC service and its realâ€‘time notification system function correctly and reliably, supporting the core mixing operations of the Bitcoin privacy platform.
